QKit Driver Categorization Overview

This section provides a comprehensive overview and categorisation of all the instrument drivers utilised within the QKit project, alongside their relevant documentation.

QKit Instrument Drivers

Driver Name

Category

Manufacturer

Is Abstract/Virtual

Description

Documentation Link

Keysight_DSOX1102G.py

Oscilloscope

Keysight

No

Driver for Keysight DSOX1102G Digital Storage Oscilloscope.

RS_RT2000.py

Oscilloscope

Rohde & Schwarz

No

Driver for Rohde & Schwarz RT2000 Real-time Oscilloscope.

AbstractMicrowaveSource.py

Oscilloscope

Home-built

Yes

Abstract base class for microwave source implementations, providing a common interface for all signal generators.

Agilent_DSO.py

Oscilloscope

Agilent

No

Driver for Agilent Digital Storage Oscilloscope.

ZHInst_UHFQA.py

Lock-in Amplifier

Zurich Instruments

No

Driver for Zurich Instruments UHFQA Quantum Analyzer, specialized for qubit readout applications.

SR_830.py

Lock-in Amplifier

Stanford Research Systems

No

Driver for Stanford Research Systems SR830 Lock-in Amplifier.

SR_830.py

Lock-in Amplifier

Stanford Research Systems

No

Driver for Stanford Research Systems SR830 Lock-in Amplifier, supporting phase-sensitive detection.

Agilent_E8257D.py

Signal Generator

Keysight

No

Driver for the Agilent/Keysight E8257D PSG Signal Generator, supporting high-frequency signal generation.

Qblox_QCM.py

Signal Generator

Qblox

No

Driver for Qblox Qubit Control Module (QCM), designed for precise qubit manipulation and control.

Keithley_2450.py

Source Measure Unit

Keithley

No

Main driver for Keithley 2450 Source Measure Unit (SMU), providing precision voltage/current sourcing and measurement.

Oxford_Triton.py

Cryogenic Controller

Oxford Instruments

No

Controller for Oxford Instruments Triton dilution refrigerator, managing temperature control and monitoring.

RS_FSUP.py

Spectrum Analyzer

Rohde & Schwarz

No

Driver for Rohde & Schwarz FSUP Spectrum Analyzer.

Anritsu_MS2830A.py

Spectrum Analyzer

Anritsu

No

Driver for Anritsu MS2830A Field Master Pro (Spectrum Analyzer and VNA).

virtual_measure_spec.py

Spectrum Analyzer

Virtual

Yes

Virtual driver for spectrum measurement.

Spectrum_M3i2132.py

Spectrum Analyzer

Spectrum GmbH

No

Driver for Spectrum GmbH M3i.2132 Digitizer/AWG card (often used for spectrum analysis).

Spectrum_M4i2211.py

Spectrum Analyzer

Spectrum GmbH

No

Driver for Spectrum GmbH M4i.2211 Digitizer/AWG card (often used for spectrum analysis).

Spectrum_M2i2030.py

Spectrum Analyzer

Spectrum GmbH

No

Driver for Spectrum GmbH M2i.2030 Digitizer/AWG card (often used for spectrum analysis).

Spectrum_M4i2211.py

Spectrum Analyzer

Spectrum GmbH

No

Driver for Spectrum GmbH Digitizer/AWG card, commonly used for spectrum analysis applications.

NI_DAQ.py

Multimeter

National Instruments

No

Generic driver for National Instruments Data Acquisition devices, supporting various I/O operations.

ZHInst_Abstractv2.py

Core / Abstract Base Classes

Zurich Instruments

Yes

Abstract base class for Zurich Instruments devices (version 2).

ZHInst_Abstract.py

Core / Abstract Base Classes

Zurich Instruments

Yes

Abstract base class for Zurich Instruments devices.

AbstractVNA.py

Core / Abstract Base Classes

Internal / Core

Yes

Abstract base class for Vector Network Analyzers.

AbstractMicrowaveSource.py

Core / Abstract Base Classes

Internal / Core

Yes

Abstract base class for microwave sources.

__init__.py

Core / Abstract Base Classes

Internal / Core

Yes

Internal Python package initialization file.
